00015 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_KERNELS_SPHERICAL_KERNEL_H
00016 #define __MLPACK_CORE_KERNELS_SPHERICAL_KERNEL_H
00017 
00018 #include <boost/math/special_functions/gamma.hpp>
00019 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace mlpack {
00022 namespace kernel {
00023 
00024 class SphericalKernel
00025 {
00026  public:
00027   SphericalKernel() :
00028     bandwidth(1.0),
00029     bandwidthSquared(1.0) {}
00030   SphericalKernel(double b) :
00031     bandwidth(b),
00032     bandwidthSquared(b*b) {}
00033 
00034   template<typename VecType>
00035   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00036   {
00037     return
00038       (metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) <= bandwidthSquared) ?
00039         1.0 : 0.0;
00040   }
00053   template<typename VecType>
00054   double ConvolutionIntegral(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00055   {
00056     double distance = sqrt(metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b));
00057     if (distance >= 2.0 * bandwidth)
00058     {
00059       return 0.0;
00060     }
00061     double volumeSquared = pow(Normalizer(a.n_rows), 2.0);
00062 
00063     switch(a.n_rows)
00064     {
00065       case 1:
00066         return 1.0 / volumeSquared * (2.0 * bandwidth - distance);
00067         break;
00068       case 2:
00069         return 1.0 / volumeSquared *
00070           (2.0 * bandwidth * bandwidth * acos(distance/(2.0 * bandwidth)) -
00071           distance / 4.0 * sqrt(4.0*bandwidth*bandwidth-distance*distance));
00072         break;
00073       default:
00074         Log::Fatal << "The spherical kernel does not support convolution\
00075           integrals above dimension two, yet..." << std::endl;
00076         return -1.0;
00077         break;
00078     }
00079   }
00080   double Normalizer(size_t dimension)
00081   {
00082     return pow(bandwidth, (double) dimension) * pow(M_PI, dimension / 2.0) /
00083         boost::math::tgamma(dimension / 2.0 + 1.0);
00084   }
00085   double Evaluate(double t)
00086   {
00087     return (t <= bandwidth) ? 1.0 : 0.0;
00088   }
00089 
00091   std::string ToString() const
00092   {
00093     std::ostringstream convert;
00094     convert << "SphericalKernel [" << this << "]" << std::endl;
00095     convert << "  Bandwidth: " << bandwidth << std::endl;
00096     return convert.str();
00097   }
00098 
00099  private:
00100   double bandwidth;
00101   double bandwidthSquared;
00102 };
